item.title: Indirecta Pixel Event & more
item.content:encoded:
âš™ï¸ Hello again Indirecta enthusiasts!â€‹

This is our second "blog"! We hope you're going to like this new stuff :)

ğŸ™Œ First Indirecta Pixel Eventâ€‹

After working a while on OCF, Pointcove's amazing estabilishment, we've decided to start hosting little update events for our members and enthusiasts alike, we've already hosted the first one! We demoed pCsi, although we've had a few issues, and showed the amazing iComm install at OCF!

ğŸŒ² iComm Forest Demo Releaseâ€‹

Following the event, we've decided to refurbish our old iFROTG (Indirecta Free Range Open Testing Grounds) game to use as a public demo for the latest iComm revisions, wanna try it out?

  • https://www.roblox.com/games/12778761931/iComm-Forest-Demo

ğŸ’» pCsi Cubicle Demo Releaseâ€‹

Just after this, we didn't stop and released our second demo game for pCsi, our joint project with Pointcove to bring a somewhat realistic UNIX Terminal to Xinu!

  • https://www.roblox.com/games/12778761931/iComm-Forest-Demo

ğŸ¦ Indirecta Products Channelâ€‹

Confused by the documentation page layout? Eager to have a refined list of all the things we've released? You'll be able to find this in our Discord, under the main category
and yes, we've also released KiChain

  • https://discord.gg/xz4Xm8URcF

ğŸ¦¾ pCsi Accessories by PIXIâ€‹

We've created pCsi with Pointcove to spread our love for free open source devices & products. This is one of the reasons this beautiful creation by one of our members came to be.
Check out this beautiful Xinu server by PIXI Group, you'll see them on our partner wall!

ğŸ¤ NetPox Partnershipâ€‹

We've partnered with NetPox! You may know them for their fantastic NetTec fire alarm system! You'll also find them on our homepage.

âš—ï¸ We're still looking for testers!â€‹

item.title: July Devlog
item.content:encoded:
âš™ï¸ Hello Indirecta enthusiasts!â€‹

This is our attempt to transfer important news to our community in a different way :)

ğŸŒ Website Domain Changeâ€‹

Thanks to our wonderful pal at Car Parking Level 7, galacticinspired, we've been able to switch website domain to a sleeker

ğŸ¥.. indirecta.tech ğŸ†â€‹

You'll now be spending a lot less time navigating to our website, or perhaps sharing it ğŸ˜

ğŸ™ï¸ iComm 1.5 Beta Releaseâ€‹

  • â­• New circle apps: Record Firewall & Walkie Talkie, an alternative to the traditional firewall remote and a simpler way to communicate
  • ğŸ—ºï¸ D-Pad movement & optimizations come to the Map application! Switch modes using the left function key LFN
  • ğŸ›°ï¸ Radiocomm now supports Roblox's new TextChatService along with SOS & editable frequency textbox
  • ğŸ”§ Tool Model changes to support for the upcoming cradle, and flashlight fixes

ğŸ§‘â€ğŸ’» iComm+ Installation Serviceâ€‹

Introducing iComm+! A paid install service that allows for custom devices, apps, and accessories running on the iComm firmware you know and love. This is still experimental, prices are guaranteed to change and there are no refunds.

ğŸ¤ Our awesome partnership with Scadaâ€‹

Yes, we've partnered with Scada! You make know them as the group behind the Ae Expanse, SmartDMX, or Hanover. We recommend checking them out if you aren't already in their server, and trying out their products. Who knows what cool stuff could come out in the future? Check all of our partners on the main home page!

âš—ï¸ We're still looking for testers!â€‹
